translation.escape_puzzle_stand_portal_nodirt.narrat: You stand on the portal. The wand activates the portal, but nothing really happened. Seems like you are still missing something important to make it fully work. You step back from the portal. You may want to look for a description of this long distance travel portal from somewhere.
translation.escape_puzzle_stand_portal_nothing.narra: You stand on portal. Nothing happened. It seems like you need to insert something into the hole to make it operate. You step back from the portal. You might need to find a full desciption of this long distance travel portal.
translation.escape_puzzle_vew_flower_dirt.narration:
You look at the flower stand. You see three pots with plants in them. 
		The dirt in these pots look different to each other. Seems like someone carefully transplanted those vegetation with the dirt from their origins. 
		From the left to the right, they are labeled as, number one,  Fang Flower, number two, Blackberry, and number three, Mandrake. 
		You can take some dirt from one of these pots to help you travel through the portal.
translation.escape_puzzle_grab_dirt.narration: From the left to the right, they are labeled as, number one,  Fang Flower, number two, Blackberry, and number three, Mandrake. You can take some dirt from any pot. Which number of pot do you want to take some dirt from?
translation.escape_puzzle_grab_dirt.reprompt: Which number of pot do you want to grab the dirt from? or you can do nothing.
translation.escape_puzzle_grab_dirt.recap: Which number of pot do you want to grab the dirt from? or you can do nothing.
translation.escape_puzzle_vew_flower_dirt_3.narratio: You grab the dirt from pot number three, mandrake, and hold it in your hand.
translation.escape_puzzle_vew_flower_dirt_2.narratio: You grab the dirt from pot number two, black berry, and hold it in your hand.
translation.escape_puzzle_vew_flower_dirt_1.narratio: You grab the dirt from pot number one, fang flower, and hold it in your hand.
translation.escape_puzzle_box_break.narration: The metal box is broken. <audio src='https://koetest.s3.amazonaws.com/Act5/Act+5+puzzle/metalcrack_01.mp3'/> From the container, you retrieve a wand.
translation.escape_puzzle_heatup_metalbox.narration: You heat up the metalbox with the alcohol burner.
translation.escape_puzzle_freeze_metalbox.narration: You freeze the metalbox by putting it into the ice barrel. <audio src='https://koetest.s3.amazonaws.com/Act5/Act+5+puzzle/ice_01.mp3'/>
translation.escape_puzzle_view_flower.narration:
You look at the flower stand. You see three pots with plants in them. 
		The dirt in these pots look different to each other. Seems like someone carefully transplanted those vegetations with the dirts from their origins. 
		From the left to the right, they are labeled as, number one,  Fang Flower, number two, Blackberry, and number three, Mandrake. 
		You can sort of, take some dirt from any of the pots and grab it in your hand. But you have no clue what to do with it.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_portal.narration:
You look at the portal. The portal is a cirle on the floor with inscriptions that you can't understand painted around. 
		The paintings lead to a hole on the floor just in front of the circle. Along with the hole is a little inscription that reads: 
		long distance travel portal. It looks like something needs to be inserted into the hole to operate the portal. 
		You can use anything on the portal, or stand on the portal.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_portal_wand.narration: You look at the portal. The portal is a cirle on the floor with glowing inscriptions that you can't understand painted around. The paintings lead to a hole on the floor with a wand sticking into it. Along with the hole is a little inscription that reads: long distance travel portal. You may want to stand on the portal.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_barrel.narration:
You look at the wooden barrel. Removing the cover carefully. You see that it's filled up with ice. 
		Where did he get so many ice in a cave in the middle of a desert? You can use anything on the barrel to freeze it.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_alcohollamp.narration:
You look at the alcohol burner. Judging by the marks and scratches on it, it seems like it has been used frequently. 
		You can use anything on the burner to heat it up.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_newspaper.narration: You look at the newspaper. <audio src='https://koetest.s3.amazonaws.com/Act5/Act+5+puzzle/newspaper_01.mp3'/> After Expanding it carefully. It reads, Magic Daily. Customer complaints about the wand containers from Juan’s Wonderful One-Stop Wand Warehouse are not strong enough to protect their luxury wands. Juan responded that all their containers are made by death metal, which is the hardest metal in the world. The problem must be caused by improper use.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_trash.narration: You look at the trash bin. You find a crumbled piece, dirty piece of newspaper. It seems that he was using it to wipe his table. You can read the newspaper.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_metalbox.narration: You look at the metal box. On the cover, it writes, Wand, of The Sylvan Forest. You flip it over. On the bottom, it has a stamp that reads, Juan’s Wonderful One-Stop Wand Warehouse. When you try to remove the cover, the box glows an alarming red. The man must have put some spells on the box, so he is the only one who can open it. If you want to open it, you need to find a way to break it.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_chest.narration: You look at the chest. It isn't locked. You open it up easily. In the chest, you see a long metal box, and an alcohol burner.
translation.escape_puzzle_open_notebook.narration: You look at the notebook. <audio src='https://koetest.s3.amazonaws.com/Act5/Act+5+puzzle/openbook_01.mp3'/> What keyword do you want to search?
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search.reprompt: You can search any keyword or close the notebook.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search.recap: You can't do that. You can search any keyword or close the notebook.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_whichflower.narra: What kind of flower or plants are you searching for? Say the name.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_wand.narra: You search if there's a book mark about the Wand of The Sylvan Forest, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. This wand is Hand carved from the trees of Sylvan Glade, it holds immense power. I use it to operate my long distance travel portal.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_portal.nar: You search if there's a book mark about the long distance travel portal, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. I put a Transportalate spell on it, and use, wand of the sylvan forest to operate it. So I can travel through the world. As long as, I have the dirt from the place I want to travel to. Grab the dirt in the hand,  stand on the portal, and say, teleport. I will be there immediately. Easily say, teleport back, I will be on the portal again.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_mandrake.n: You search if there's a book mark about mandrakes, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. Mandrake can be found in the magic realm, my hometown. I transplanted it from the area around the broken down greenhouse.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_fangflower: You search if there's a book mark about the fang flower, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. I brought the fang flower back from a strange place. Several years ago, I recieved a bottle of dirt from a spice market. I used the dirt to travel through the portal into another world. The sky over there was dark and the plants were glowing. I took the fang flower from there and teleport back immediately.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_blackberry: You search if there's a book mark about black berries, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. blackberry is been found from oasis springs. But when I first steped into this cave, I found it's also grows here. So I transplanted it into the pot to remember it is the only living form in this cave before I came.
translation.escape_puzzle_notebook_search_deathmetal: You search if there's a book mark about death metal, and then you flip the notebook to that page. It reads. Death metal is the hardest metal in the world. It will survive from any external force. But, research found, an alternated hot and cold will destory its form.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_notebook.narration:
You look at the notebook. It's a heavy notebook. Dozens of bookmarks stick on pages. 
		You take it with you. So, 
		At anytime, you can look at the notebook to search different keywords.
translation.escape_puzzle_view_table.narration: You look at the table. It's right in front of you. On top of the table, you see a notebook, and a wooden barrel.
translation.escape_puzzle_whatdo.narration: You can look around, or look at specific things.
translation.escape_puzzle_whatdo_take_dirt_Y.narrati: take some dirt from any flower pot,
translation.escape_puzzle_whatdo_barrel_Y.narration: use anything on the wooden barrel,
translation.escape_puzzle_whatdo_burner_Y.narration: use anything on the alcohol burner,
translation.escape_puzzle_whatdo_portal_Y.narration: use anything on the portal, or stand on the portal
